      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void dance(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      This method is used to make the robot dance once it returns to a colour it has met before
      static void findBlackLine(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      The robot will move forward until it reaches a black line
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the main program code for the robot, it manipulates other methods to perform the task of finding a matching colour the robot has recognized previously and then returns to that colour and dances
      static void moveLeftOnColour(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds a white area
      static void moveLeftOnLine(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds the black line again from being on an area of white
      static void moveRightOnColour(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds a non-white area
      static void moveRightOnLine(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
      The robot Will move in a turning motion until it finds an area of white from being on the black line
      static void sing(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Speaker mySpeaker)
      This method is used to make the robot sing upon finding a matching colour that it has previously seen before
      static void traverseBlackLine(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor, ShefRobot.ColorSensor mySensor)
      This method is used so that the robot traverses the black line, this is achived by following the edge of the black line, so the robot will re-adjust itself when it detects either black or white so that it can remain on the edge of a black line.
      static void traverseColour(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot, ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor, ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor, ShefRobot.ColorSensor mySensor, int count)
      The robot navigates around the circumference of a circle in an alternate directon each time it reaches a new colour

      • sing

        public static void sing(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot,
                        ShefRobot.Speaker mySpeaker)
        This method is used to make the robot sing upon finding a matching colour that it has previously seen before
        Parameters:
        myRobot - The robot object created from the Shefrobot package
        mySpeaker - The speaker object of the robot so that it can output sound

      • dance

        public static void dance(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot,
                         ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor,
                         ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor)
        This method is used to make the robot dance once it returns to a colour it has met before
        Parameters:
        myRobot - The robot object created from the Shefrobot package
        largeMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot
        mediumMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot

      • traverseBlackLine

        public static void traverseBlackLine(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot,
                                     ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor,
                                     ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor,
                                     ShefRobot.ColorSensor mySensor)
        This method is used so that the robot traverses the black line, this is achived by following the edge of the black line, so the robot will re-adjust itself when it detects either black or white so that it can remain on the edge of a black line.
        Parameters:
        myRobot - The robot object created from the Shefrobot package
        largeMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot
        mediumMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot
        mySensor - An object of the robot that is used to detect colour

      • traverseColour

        public static void traverseColour(ShefRobot.Robot myRobot,
                                  ShefRobot.Motor largeMotor,
                                  ShefRobot.Motor mediumMotor,
                                  ShefRobot.ColorSensor mySensor,
                                  int count)
        The robot navigates around the circumference of a circle in an alternate directon each time it reaches a new colour
        Parameters:
        myRobot - The robot object created from the Shefrobot package
        largeMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot
        mediumMotor - One of the two motor objects of the robot
        mySensor - An object of the robot that is used to detect colour
        count - A count value is passed to the method and is incremented each time the robot detects a colour and its value is manipulated to determine which direction of the circumference of the circle to travel (clockwise or anticlockwise) to create randomness

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main program code for the robot, it manipulates other methods to perform the task of finding a matching colour the robot has recognized previously and then returns to that colour and dances
        Parameters:
        args - An array of string arguments that can be passed in from the command line
